welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Oak Park! Known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and vibrant community, we invite you to explore and discover all that this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport is where all international flights arrive and depart.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights. It offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all air freight and cargo operations, providing efficient and secure handling of goods.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
